name: STRANGLE/HOLD
description:
---------------------------------------

DIRECTIVE(S): 

+LOCATE INFESTATION+

+KILL THEM ALL+

+SURVIVE+

---------------------------------------

[EPILEPSY WARNING] This game shakes a lot and has changing colors, be careful if you have any pre-existing medical conditions.

STRANGLE/HOLD is a wave-based top-down shooter where a small biomachine named "HEMO HEMO" is sent to eliminate a plague before it spreads. Using a unique grappling hook that allows him to steal unique weapons from his enemies, it's up to HEMO HEMO to save humanity.

The horizon filled with teeth is approaching.

STRANGLE/HOLD was created by John Ellis.

STRANGLE/HOLD's music was composed by:

Kiseff: https://soundcloud.com/kiseff

Desolatech: https://soundcloud.com/desolatech

(Special thanks to Kin for collecting screenshots!)
